The Chef's Market

 

Featuring local artisans and farmers in the Winchester, Virginia area. We have local produce, dairy, meats, cheese and the finest grocery items on hand. Winchester's premier Grab-N-Go eatery.

Check in daily for specials and featured items!

(540)773-4413

We now offer Beer and Wine!

We carry a fantastic selection of local craft beers and award winning wines.

Grab-N-Go

Stop by The Chef’s Market today and grab one of our signature crab cakes, pre-made sandwiches, wraps and salads. Need something tonight, we offer Curbside Cuisine To-Go Dinners Tuesday- Friday!

Ask about our new selection of wines and craft beers!

Meet

Bonnie and Phil

Bonnie Jones and Phil Anderson, after 33 years together, have decided to open The Chef’s Market in Winchester, Virginia. Featuring local foods from the surrounding area, their carefully crafted selection of products are the finest cheeses, meats, eggs and grocery items around.

Gourmet Foods

Featuring local artisans and farmers in the Winchester, Virginia area. We will have produce, dairy, meats, cheese and the finest grocery items on hand.
